export TM_YEAR=`date +%Y` export TM_DATE=`date +%Y-%m-%d` TM_HEADER=$(ruby <<"EOF" puts ENV['TM_NEW_FILE'].gsub(/java$/,'tml').gsub('java', 'resources') EOF) export PACKAGE=$(ruby <<"EOF" puts ENV['TM_NEW_FILE_DIRECTORY'].gsub(/^.*java\//,'').gsub('/','.') EOF)
if [[ ! (-f $TM_NEW_FILE || -f $TM_HEADER) ]]; then perl -pe 's/\$\{([^}]*)\}/$ENV{$1}/g' <template_in.java >"$TM_NEW_FILE" perl -pe 's/\$\{([^}]*)\}/$ENV{$1}/g' <template_in.tml >"$TM_HEADER" fi
